Text:
Changes in v2.0.2.3929:

New! Support for Windows 8 Consumer Preview
New! Improved Reading and Writing Engines
New! Enhanced System Reporting
New! Real Time Optical Drive support

Upgrade! SPTD 1.81 (supports Windows 8 customer preview)
Upgrade! VDriver updated to 4.44 (supports Windows 8 customer preview)
Upgrade! Installation script for Automount Service
Upgrade! Alcohol Audio Converter
Upgrade! Language Files
